roleset.name: not doing anything
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-6. Relation to act.02.

example.name: args 0, ADJ
example.text: In the results publicly released by the Songyuan Municipal Discipline Inspection Commission , it said , in view of the illegal administrative inaction of Gao Yong , vice-mayor of Fuyu County and the other six people , after discussion , the standing committee of Songyuan Municipal Discipline Inspection Commission decided to deal with it ... and so on .
example.arg: of Gao Yong , vice-mayor of Fuyu County and the other six people
